title: ChatGPT Now Has an iPhone App
description: Six months after OpenAI’s silver-tongued chatbot launched on the web and set off an AI arms race, you can put it in your pocket.

title: Politicians Need to Learn How AI Works—Fast
description: Tech regulation has often disappointed. Automation expert Missy Cummings hopes a course to teach policymakers about artificial intelligence can help.

title: Pete Buttigieg Loves God, Beer, and His Electric Mustang
description: Sure, the US secretary of transportation has thoughts on building bridges. But infrastructure occupies just a sliver of his voluminous mind.
